<!--This file is autogenerated-->

Deploys a deToken(XDCBridgeTokenProxy) for an asset.

# Variables

## tokenImplementation
```solidity
  address public tokenImplementation;
```
Address of xdcBridgeToken implementation
## xdcBridgeTokenAdmin
```solidity
  address public xdcBridgeTokenAdmin;
```
An addres to set as admin for any deployed xdcBridgeToken
## xbridgeAddress
```solidity
  address public xbridgeAddress;
```
Xbridge gate address
## getDeployedAssetAddress
```solidity
  mapping(bytes32 => address) public getDeployedAssetAddress;
```
Maps xbridge id to xdcBridgeToken address
## overridedTokens
```solidity
  mapping(bytes32 => struct XDCBridgeTokenDeployer.OverridedTokenInfo) public overridedTokens;
```
Maps xbridge id to overridden token info (name, symbol). Used when autogenerated
values for a token are not ideal.

# Functions
## initialize
```solidity
  function initialize(
            address _tokenImplementation,
            address _xdcBridgeTokenAdmin,
            address _xbridgeAddress
  ) public
```

Constructor that initializes the most important configurations.

### Parameters:
| Name | Type | Description                                                          |
| :--- | :--- | :------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|`_tokenImplementation` | address | Address of xdcBridgeToken implementation
|`_xdcBridgeTokenAdmin` | address | Address to set as admin for any deployed xdcBridgeToken
|`_xbridgeAddress` | address | XDCBridge gate address

## deployAsset
```solidity
  function deployAsset(
            bytes32 _xbridgeId,
            string _name,
            string _symbol,
            uint8 _decimals
  ) external returns (address xdcBridgeTokenAddress)
```

Deploy a deToken for an asset

### Parameters:
| Name | Type | Description                                                          |
| :--- | :--- | :------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|`_xbridgeId` | bytes32 | Asset identifier
|`_name` | string | Asset name
|`_symbol` | string | Asset symbol
|`_decimals` | uint8 | Asset decimals

## implementation
```solidity
  function implementation(
  ) public returns (address)
```

Beacon getter for the xdcBridgeToken contracts


## setTokenImplementation
```solidity
  function setTokenImplementation(
            address _impl
  ) external
```

Set xdcBridgeToken implementation contract address

### Parameters:
| Name | Type | Description                                                          |
| :--- | :--- | :------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|`_impl` | address | Wrapped asset implementation contract address.

## setXDCBridgeTokenAdmin
```solidity
  function setXDCBridgeTokenAdmin(
            address _xdcBridgeTokenAdmin
  ) external
```

Set admin for any deployed xdcBridgeToken.

### Parameters:
| Name | Type | Description                                                          |
| :--- | :--- | :------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|`_xdcBridgeTokenAdmin` | address | Admin address.

## setXbridgeAddress
```solidity
  function setXbridgeAddress(
            address _xbridgeAddress
  ) external
```

Sets core xbridge contract address.

### Parameters:
| Name | Type | Description                                                          |
| :--- | :--- | :------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|`_xbridgeAddress` | address | Xbridge address.

## setOverridedTokenInfo
```solidity
  function setOverridedTokenInfo(
            bytes32[] _xbridgeIds,
            struct XDCBridgeTokenDeployer.OverridedTokenInfo[] _tokens
  ) external
```

Override specific tokens name/symbol

### Parameters:
| Name | Type | Description                                                          |
| :--- | :--- | :------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|`_xbridgeIds` | bytes32[] | Array of xbridgeIds for tokens
|`_tokens` | struct XDCBridgeTokenDeployer.OverridedTokenInfo[] | Array of new name/symbols for tokens

## OverridedTokenInfo
```solidity
struct OverridedTokenInfo {
    bool accept;
    string name;
    string symbol;
}
```
